briefTitle: Stopping Cavities Study: Diammine Silver Fluoride

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Nyvad criteria 3
* Active carious lesion

Exclusion Criteria:

* Allergy to silver
* Stomatitis or oral ulcerative condition
* Weight less than 15 kg

outcomeMeasures.title: Dental Caries Activity
outcomeMeasures.description: Proportion of treated teeth with active decay that were arrested by the treatment measured using the Nyvad criterion code 6 reflecting hardness of the lesion and color change
